title.rendered: Diabadox 60 Capsules helps Maintain Blood Glucose Levels

content.rendered:
• DiabaDox is a research-based food supplement formulated with patented active ingredients, including 100% stabilized Allicin, designed to help stabilize blood glucose levels and promote overall health.Diabadox provides the health benefits equivalent to consuming 360 cloves of fresh raw garlic in just one (431mg) capsule.This advanced formula is ideal for those seeking to maintain healthy blood sugar levels and live a more balanced and healthier lifestyle.

Key Benefits:

  • Stabilizes Blood Glucose Levels: May control and stabilize blood glucose levels and help maintain healthy HbA1c levels.
  • Boosts Immune System: Helps overall wellness by protecting against common illnesses such as the cold and flu.
  • Supports Overall Health: DiabaDox is not only for individuals with high blood sugar levels, but also for anyone seeking to support their glucose metabolism and overall well-being.
  • No Known Side Effects: The formula is 100% vegetarian, safe, and free from any known side effects when used as directed.

Ideal for:

Individuals with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes
Those with Gestational Diabetes Mellitus (GDM)
Pre-diabetic individuals

Direction of use:
Take 1 for Wellbeing
Blood Glucose Level < 8 = 2 Capsules
Blood Glucose Level > 8 = 3 Capsules
Daily with a meal or as directed by your health care physician.
Maximum daily intake must not exceed 4 capsules
Suitable for: Adults of 16 years and over.
Ingredients: Active ingredients – Allicin Extract (garlic bulb), Cinnamon Extract, Bitter Melon Extract, Grapes Fruit Extract, Excipients
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
